snippet.title: KINDLING SPIRITS is Launched - I Made a Video Game!
snippet.description:
I made a whole video game by myself in seven months! It releases today and I'm super proud of it - I hope you try it out! Check it out below:

https://alliemackie.itch.io/kindling-spirits

Join me on Patreon! Support my game dev work and get exclusive access to lots of game dev process previews!

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
PATREON: https://www.patreon.com/alliemackie
GUMROAD: https://gumroad.com/alliemackie
REDBUBBLE: https://www.redbubble.com/people/alliemackie/
FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/alliemackie/
TWITTER: https://twitter.com/alliemackie
INSTAGRAM: https://www.instagram.com/alliemackie/

----------------------------------------------------------------------------
TOOLS USED:

Art:
Wacom Cintiq 13HD Creative Tablet
Clip Studio Paint Pro: https://www.clipstudio.net/en/
Frenden CSP Brushes: https://frenden.com/post/174824031302/frenden-clip-studio-brushes

Recording:
OBS Studio

Editing:
Adobe Premiere Pro

Audio:
Blue Snowball ICE Microphone

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
MUSIC:
Pocket Sound – https://pocket-se.info/
